name: my first uni project game
description:
hi i am very tired beyond reason so here's the project i made, if you wanna play it by all means but i don't recommend it also if you couldn't tell im not the best sales person, but don't worry about that 'cause this is free, the only thing it costs and wastes is your time

you can bully me in the comments if you'd like to make a young man cry <3
